profile:
***CALL TO HEAR OUR SPECIAL OFFERS TODAY***

DC SHUTTERS specializes in quality Canadian Manufacturer Shutters that withstand our harsh Canadian climate. 

Customers are happy because we provide custom shutters at great prices tailored to their needs. Our consultants and have over 22 years experience EACH so they are able to help you choose wisely. 

Our installers have over 25 years installing shutters so your shutters will function perfectly for many years. Your shutter is fabricated using quality wood, vinyl and paints so it will continue to look great for many years. Everyone we show them to agrees that the quality is easy to see and feel - so see for yourself. 

You provide the coffee and we will provide FREE advice in the comfort of your home. Weâ€™ll even bring our Plantation and California Wood Shutters samples for you to review.
 
Once you review what customers say about our offering - 
 
Check Out Our Website To:
 
- BOOK APPOINTMENT
- GET A QUICK QUOTE 
- REVIEW OUR OUR OFFERING
- CHECK OUT SPECIAL OFFERS
products:
Our most popular wood shutter is manufactured by a local company 
that uses the highest high quality wood and paints, so your shutters
look better and last longer at a fraction of the price.

More important - we are able to custom design and install your 
shutters quickly. No long wait period.

Have a look at our samples and see the quality difference.

Our most popular vinyl shutter is made by Canada's 
premier manufacturers of windows - your vinyl is made of
the same pure un-recycled vinyl resin that will not change 
colour or warp.

CHECK OUT OUR WEBSITE FOR MORE PRODUCT DETAILS.

profile:
RESIDENTIAL & COMMERCIAL WINDOW COVERINGS ONTARIO, CANADA
Modern window fashion is family owned and operated and has been in operation for 26 years. We provide Residential Window Covering and Commercial Window Covering Services. Keeping our customers and new clients satisfied with the best quality Window Covering services and products. We have Professional Window Covering Installers with over 28 years of experience. Our service is second to none. All our Residential & Commercial Window Coverings Products are Candian made. We carry product from some of the top manufactures of window coverings in Canada. We warranty all our Window Covering Products.

We're social are:
https://www.facebook.com/Modern-Window-Fashion-106275197457173/
https://twitter.com/BarringtonMcLa1
services:
20-California And Plantation Wood Shutters
We carry the Best Quality in California, Plantation, Vinyl and Wood Shutters. Modern Window Fashion will transform any Window in your home from Traditional to Contemporary.


California And Plantation Vinyl Shutters
We carry the Best Quality in California, Plantation, Vinyl and Wood Shutters. Modern Window Fashion will transform any Window in your home from Traditional to Contemporary.




Blinds and Shades at Modern Window Fashion - Window Fashion Brampton
Window Blinds and Window Shades
Modern Window Fashion carries a large variety of different Window Blinds and Shades such as ROMAN SHADES, ZEBRA DUAL SHADES & VISION BLINDS, FAUX WOOD BLINDS and many more. All our Window Covering Products are made with the highest quality materials, UV protected and warranted.
Window Glass Replacement - Window Treatments Ottawa by Modern Window Fashion
Window Glass Replacement
Modern Window Fashion will replace the glass in your window if the glass or seal is broken and causing condensation between the two panes of glass.
Window Shutter Repair and Shutter Respray - Window Treatments Caledon by Modern Window Fashion
Window Shutter Repair and Shutter Respray
Modern Window Fashion will Repair and Respray your old existing Window Shutters making them like new again.
Door Inserts Stain Glass
Door Inserts Stain Glass
Our Stained Glass Door Inserts will give your old existing doors a new vibrant look.
Door Inserts Wrought Iron 
Door Inserts Wrought Iron
Our Wrought Iron Door Inserts will give your old existing doors a new vibrant look.

profile:
Here at Sensational Seams, we are delighted to offer you many services. We look forward to working with you to create a space that you love. We provide Custom Designed Window Treatments, Bed Ensembles, Furniture, Re-Upholstery & Re-Finishing, Area Rugs, Flooring, Paint Colour Consultations, Wallpaper and Interior Design!

We serve many areas around our location. Talk to us about coming to your area! You can find us serving Clarington, Durham Region, and have gone as far as Hamilton, Kingston, Orangeville, and Toronto.

Who are we and what do we do at Sensational Seams? We are Window Fashion Specialists and Interior Designers who have over 28 years experience designing and sewing unique window treatments right here in Newcastle, focusing on superior quality and customized workmanship.

We are Certified Installers and Providers of Hunter Douglas window treatments.

We are partnered with Exciting Windows! which provides a 4-way guarantee! Visit excitingwindows.com/sensationalseams

At Sensational Seams we specialize in Drapery Designs & Innovations, Window Treatment Installations, Full Service Interior Design, Automated Window Treatments, Colour Consultations, Upholstery & Furniture Refinishing ,Custom Bedding, Lighting, Wall Art, Wallpaper and Painting Services, Custom Wall Unit Cabinet Design, Window Film, Shopping, Plumbing, Welding, Renovation, Carpentry, Electrical Work and Project Management.

Wilma Kulyk is an award-winning interior design professional who provides customized draperies and blinds for both large-scale commercial and individual residential clients.

BEHIND THE SEAMS CREATING YOUR DREAMS! SENSATIONAL SEAMS HAS THE SOLUTION FOR YOU! Check out our website: sensationalseams.com
